channel.title: ASF Jira
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HIVE-15552] Unable to coalesce DATE and TIMESTAMP types
item.description:
COALESCE expression does not expect DATE and TIMESTAMP types

select tdt.rnum, coalesce(tdt.cdt, cast(tdt.cdt as timestamp)) from certtext.tdt
Error: Error while compiling statement: FAILED: SemanticException Line 0:-1 Argument type mismatch 'cdt': The expressions after COALESCE should all have the same type: "date" is expected but "timestamp" is found
SQLState: 42000
ErrorCode: 40000
item.summary: Unable to coalesce DATE and TIMESTAMP types

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.
